text: Kamen Rider Super-1 is a Japanese television series. It is the seventh installment in the Kamen Rider Series. The series was broadcast on the Mainichi Broadcasting System from October 17, 1980, to October 3, 1981. The series was a co-production between Toei and Ishimori Productions. It was created by Shōtarō Ishinomori. ==Cast== * Kazuya Oki/Kamen Rider Super-1: Shunsuke Takasugi * Genjirō Tani: Nobuo Tsukamoto * Masao Kozuka (Choro): Teru Satō (Played as Teruaki Satō) * Harumi Kusanami: Yumiko Tanaka * Ryō Kusanami: Katsuya Hayakawa * Master Genkai: Munemaru Kōda * Benkei: Kenji Nishiyama * Masako Mizunuma: Reiko Nagatsuka * Daisuke Akita: Kazunori Tanaka * Shigeru Matsuoka: Tadaomi Watanabe * Mamoru Maruyama: Ayumu Iwaki * Takeshi Tanaka: Moriyuki Ogidō * Michiru Ishikawa: Izuki Nakamura * Masaru Ishikawa: Hitoshi Hagiwara * Professor Henry: Ulf Ōtsuki * Narrator: Shinji Kanae ==Kamen Rider Super-1: The Movie== The movie was released on March 14, 1981, and was produced by Tōru Hirayama. ; Cast * Kamen Rider Super-1: Shunsuke Takasugi * Jiro Tanihara: Nobuo Tsukamoto * Shiro Kazami / Kamen Rider V3 (voice): Hiroshi Miyauchi ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Kamen Rider Super-1" ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Shunsuke Takasugi with Kōrogi '73 ; Ending themes * "Hi o Fuke Rider Ken" ("The Fiery Rider Fist") ** Lyrics: Saburō Yatsude ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Shunsuke Takasugi with Kōrogi '73 ** Episodes: 1-23 * "Junior Rider Tai no Uta" ("The Song of the Junior Rider Team") ** Lyrics: Kei Akai ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Ichirou Mizuki with the Columbia Yurikago-kai and Kōrogi '73 ** Episodes: 24-48 Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:1980 television series debuts Category:1981 television series endings Category:1981 disestablishments in Asia
